original_text: And on the doors of the main hall were carved cherubim and palm trees like those carved on the walls, and there was a wooden overhang on the front of the portico.
korean_text: 이 성전 문에 그룹과 종려나무를 새겼는데 벽에 있는 것과 같고 현관 앞에는 나무 디딤판이 있으며

sentences.original_text: And on the doors of the main hall
were carved cherubim and palm trees
like those carved on the walls
and there was a wooden overhang
on the front of the portico
